name: VolkswagenCar-Net®
0:
”Alexa, ask my Car Net to lock my car”
”Alexa, ask my Car Net to Start my car”
”Alexa, ask my Car Net to start charging my car”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my car net
Developer Terms of Use
des:
VW Car-Net (Disclaimer 1) users can now link their VW Car-Net account to an Alexa (Disclaimer 2) built-in device to enable the Volkswagen Car-Net skill for Alexa. You can ask Alexa to start/stop the engine (Disclaimer 3) (if vehicle is equipped), lock/unlock doors (Disclaimer 4), or even honk and flash the lights (Disclaimer 4). You must pair your device (enable Alexa device to connect with your vehicle) for Remote Start/Stop commands. Multiple vehicles can be managed by using vehicle model name and model year. 

To get started, enable the Volkswagen Car-Net skill for Alexa by clicking the “enable” link above and login with your VW Car-Net credentials.

Supported Vehicles
Listed below are the supported Volkswagen Models. Some exceptions may apply.

Model Year 2020: 
• Arteon 
• Atlas
• Atlas Cross Sport
• Golf (limited features available)
• Jetta
• Tiguan

Basic skills
For best results, begin by saying “Alexa, launch my Car-Net”. Once you have done this, your commands can simply be:
“Honk my horn”
“Start my car” 
“Unlock my car” 
“Lock my car”
Alexa will prompt you to say your Car-Net 4-digit security PIN (Disclaimer 5) for some of the secured commands such as “Lock my car” and “Start my car.” Please make sure children or others are not in listening distance to hear your PIN. 
If you have multiple vehicles enrolled in VW Car-Net, the model name and model year in the command like this “Unlock my 2020 Atlas”.


Disclaimers:

1. Available on most MY20 and newer vehicles excluding Passat. Always pay careful attention to the road and do not drive while distracted. Certain services require trial or paid subscriptions, which may have their own terms and conditions. VW Car-Net requires vehicle cellular connectivity and availability of vehicle GPS signal, and not all services and features are available on all vehicles. Certain Car-Net services, such as Roadside Call Assist, connect out to third party providers that may require additional payment. Standard text and data rates may apply for app and web features. Certain services may collect location and vehicle information. See Terms of Service, Privacy Statement, and other important information at www.vw.com/carnet 
2. Use of the smart home integration may require compatible home device and account. Standard text and data rates may apply. Amazon, Alexa and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.
3. Requires compatible factory-installed or dealer-installed remote start feature. See Owner’s Manual for further details and important warnings about the keyless ignition feature. Do not leave vehicle unattended with the engine running, particularly in enclosed spaces, and consult local laws for any limitations on use. Standard text and data rates may apply. 
4. Standard text and data rates may apply. See Owner’s Manual for further details and important warnings about locking and unlocking your vehicle remotely. 
5. Sharing your PIN or account information will allow others to access and/or modify your vehicle’s VW Car-Net functions and settings through the Car-Net website or mobile application.
